data.title: Bad food and service!
data.text: Very rude! The food was very bad! Didn't taste fresh at all! Never again!! Wife and I ordered at the same time. Her food came out in 20 min and mine came 15-20min later. So we had dinner together separately!

data.title: Would not recommend!
data.text: I love sushi! I'm always looking for great new sushi restaurants. This restaurant is a waste of time and money! The sushi is poorly wrapped, decent taste. But I've never seen an uglier rainbow roll. I truly think I could make one better in my own home (never made sushi myself). The waitress was so slow...20 minutes just to get water. Another 20 minutes to get the bill at the end of the meal. I should have left when the water took too long. I would never recommend this restaurant!!!! It's ashame because Hollywood needs a good sushi restaurant downtown!
